name: wb_remote_entity
comment: Cache of remote entities fetched from other Wikibase repositories for federation.

columns.name: re_entity_id
columns.comment: Local entity ID within the remote repository (e.g. 'Q42').

columns.name: re_touched
columns.comment: Timestamp when this remote entity record was last updated or fetched.

columns.name: re_blob
columns.comment: Full JSON representation of the remote entity as returned by wbgetentities.
